The results from the previous section
can be understood on the level of the spectral function, which
also allows us to make exact statements about the existence of
the maximally ergodic regime as a stable attractor for the or-
thonormalization procedure. On the level of the spectral func-
tion, maximally chaotic dynamics corresponds to the spectral
function of the Krylov operators being a flat function. These
spectral functions are plotted in the left panel of Fig.
